name: I Wanna be the First
description:
Transition between dimensions! You have 120 Seconds to SLAM the like button!

You're leaving school and your favourite youtuber just posted a video. You need to get home in 120 seconds to be first to slam the like button and comment first - but you have a lot of obstacles to get passed to make it in time. You have the ability to change your dimensional perspective to surpass certain obstacles - can you make it??

Controls

Keyboard/Gamepad

Movement

WASD/Left Stick

Jump

Spacebar/South Button

Hold to jump higher

Transition perspective

E/Left Trigger

Slam

TAB/North Button

Pause Menu

Esc/Start

Credits

Programmer - Daniel Brunelle

3D Modeler/Animator - Nolan Mushtuk

Level Designer - Derek Frost
